line.originaltext: 1 (18 ounce) package small chocolate chip cookies
1/4 cup margarine, melted
1 cup hot fudge topping
2 quarts vanilla ice cream
1 cup whipped cream
12 cherries
Crush half the cookies (about 20) to make crumbs.
line.annotation: separate(ing0, ing6, "half the cookies", ing7, "half the cookies", "")

line.originaltext: Crush half the cookies (about 20) to make crumbs.
line.annotation: cut(ing6, , ing8, "cookie crumbs", "crush to make crumbs")

line.originaltext: Combine crumbs with melted margarine and press into the bottom of a 9-inch springform pan or pie plate.
Combine crumbs with melted margarine and press into the bottom of a 9-inch springform pan or pie plate.
line.annotation: create_tool(t0, "9-inch springform pan or pie plate")

line.originaltext: Combine crumbs with melted margarine and press into the bottom of a 9-inch springform pan or pie plate.
line.annotation: do(ing9, t0, ing10, "crust in pan", "press into the bottom of the pan")

line.originaltext: Stand remaining cookies around edge of pan.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing7}, ing11, "pie crust", "stand cookies around edge of pan")

line.originaltext: Spread 3/4 cup fudge topping over crust.
line.annotation: separate(ing2, ing12, "3/4 cup fudge", ing13, "1/4 cup fudge", "")

line.originaltext: Spread 3/4 cup fudge topping over crust.
line.annotation: combine({ing11, ing12}, ing14, "crust with chocolate", "spread over crust")

line.originaltext: Freeze 15 minutes.
Meanwhile, soften 1 quart of ice cream in microwave or on countertop.
Meanwhile, soften 1 quart of ice cream in microwave or on countertop.
line.annotation: separate(ing3, ing15, "1 quart ice cream", ing16, "1 quart ice cream", "")

line.originaltext: Meanwhile, soften 1 quart of ice cream in microwave or on countertop.
line.annotation: cook(ing15, t1, ing17, "soft ice cream", "soften in microwave or on countertop")

line.originaltext: After crust has chilled, spread softened ice cream over fudge layer.
After crust has chilled, spread softened ice cream over fudge layer.
line.annotation: combine({ing14, ing17}, ing18, "2 layer pie", "spread ice cream over fudge layer")

line.originaltext: Freeze 30 minutes.
Scoop remaining quart of ice cream into balls and arrange over spread ice cream layer.
line.annotation: combine({ing16, ing18}, ing19, "pie with balls", "scoop into balls and arrange over spread ice cream layer")

line.originaltext: Freeze until firm, 4 hours or overnight.
Freeze until firm, 4 hours or overnight.
To serve, garnish with remainder of fudge topping, whipped cream and cherries.
line.annotation: combine({ing13, ing19, ing4, ing5}, ing20, "pie", "garnish pie with ingredients")
